H0.text: What is the term for nutrient enrichment of lakes. Nutrient Overload

H1.text: What is the term for nutrient enrichment of lakes. Limnological Enrichment

H2.text: What is the term for nutrient enrichment of lakes. Trophic Enhancement

H3.text: What is the term for nutrient enrichment of lakes. Eutrofication

A4.text: degradation of water quality owing to enrichment by nutrients which results in excessive plant (principally algae) growth and decay.

A5.text: Eutrophication was recognized as a water pollution problem in European and North American lakes and reservoirs in the mid-20th century.
